	private MultiStatus createMultiStatus() {

();

				IStatus.ERROR,
				entries[i].getPluginId() != null ? entries
[i].getPluginId() : JavaPlugin.getPluginId(),
				IStatus.ERROR,
				entries[i].getMessage(),
				null));
		}
		return status;
	}
